info.title: Documentation of Genesis Server
info.description: Detailed documentation of apis in Genesis with Swagger. This project establishes a new genotype database specifically tailored for the needs of genebank genomics. It handles very large amounts of data. It uses Express Server and is integrated with Apache Cassandra Database.

tags.name: MetaData
tags.description: APIs for Processing Metadata of VCF File

tags.name: Variant
tags.description: APIs for Processing Variant Information of VCF File

tags.name: BRAPI
tags.description: BRAPI is a standardized RESTful web service API specification for exchanging plant breeding data between information systems. It is a shared, open API, to be used by all data providers and data consumers who wish to use the BRAPI standard.

AC.Description: Allele count in genotypes, for each ALT allele, in the same order as listed

INS:ME.Description: Insertion of a mobile element relative to the reference

NON_REF.Description: Represents any possible alternative allele at this location

*.Description: Represents any possible alternative allele at this location

VQSRTrancheINDEL99.00to100.00+.Description: Truth sensitivity tranche level for INDEL model at VQS Lod < -85077.1808

rangeBegin.description: Start of the range of variant POSITION to be processed

rangeEnd.description: End of the range of variant POSITION to be processed
